# Append this under your existing steps (after schema validate + drift check)
      - name: Diff manifests against origin/main
        run: |
          python scripts/diff_manifest.py --base origin/main --head . --out manifest_diff.json --rules manifest/rules/breaking_rules.yml
      - name: Render manifest report
        run: |
          python scripts/render_report.py --in manifest_diff.json --out manifest_report.html
      - name: Upload manifest diff artifacts
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: manifest-diff
          path: |
            manifest_diff.json
            manifest_report.html
      - name: Fail on breaking changes
        run: |
          python scripts/diff_manifest.py --base origin/main --head . --out manifest_diff.json --rules manifest/rules/breaking_rules.yml --fail-on-breaking
